title: Blended learning environment design for business administration: Flipped learning application strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational business administration theory and basic instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Practical instructional design competency enhancement program for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Propose at least three design frameworks for applying a flipped learning-based blended model to business administration education
Structure integration strategies between online pre-learning materials and offline activities according to learning objectives
Design at least two interactive formative assessments to promote learner engagement
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
